meanings.sent1: I feel sick and might puke.
meanings.sent2: After eating too much, he puked all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The baby decided to puke right after I changed his diaper.
meanings.sent4: The smell of rotten food made her want to puke.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride was so intense, it made me puke.

meanings.sent1: Please don't puke on the carpet.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hold back and puked in the trash can.
meanings.sent3: The dog managed to puke on my shoes right before I left for work.
meanings.sent4: The smell of the garbage made her puke instantly.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the slimy fish made him puke uncontrollably.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the puke sample.
meanings.sent2: There was a trail of puke leading to the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The cat left a surprise gift of puke on the rug.
meanings.sent4: The smell of the puke was unbearable.
meanings.sent5: She slipped on the puke and fell on the floor.
